channel.title: GEN on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in GEN on TechnoStreet

item.title: Musk’s Twitter Roils With Hate Speech As Trolls Test New Limits
item.description: Musk’s Twitter Roils With Hate Speech As Trolls Test New Limits Hateful and racist rhetoric swelled on the network as some politicians rejoiced.

item.title: Charting The Global Economy: ECB Boosts Rates; Fed, BOE On Deck
item.description: Charting The Global Economy: ECB Boosts Rates; Fed, BOE On Deck Here are some of the charts that appeared this week on the latest developments in the global economy.

item.title: Bolsonaro Stalls In Polls After Ally Clashes With Police
item.description: Bolsonaro Stalls In Polls After Ally Clashes With Police Leftist challenger Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, 76, would take 54% of valid votes, which exclude null and blank ballots.

item.title: Ye’s Antisemitic Rants Wreck Path To Multibillion-Dollar Fortune
item.description: Ye’s Antisemitic Rants Wreck Path To Multibillion-Dollar Fortune The rapper lost out on a lucrative deal with Adidas, which said it would end the Yeezy line after facing blowback.

item.title: Sunak’s ‘Dullness Dividend’ Might Not Last
item.description: Sunak’s ‘Dullness Dividend’ Might Not Last Britain’s new prime minister is an improvement over his predecessors — but keeping his promises won’t be easy.

item.title: Too Much Gas. Europe’s Energy Crisis Takes A Surprise Turn
item.description: Too Much Gas. Europe’s Energy Crisis Takes A Surprise Turn Europe suddenly has more gas than it can use.

item.title: Rishi Sunak Tells UK Tories To Unite As He Strives To Fix ‘Crisis’
item.description: Rishi Sunak Tells UK Tories To Unite As He Strives To Fix ‘Crisis’ Rishi Sunak called on his warring Conservative Party to unite as the UK’s incoming prime minister bids to fix the crisis facing the economy.

item.title: Sunak Edges Closer to UK Leadership Prize As Johnson Caves
item.description: Sunak Edges Closer to UK Leadership Prize As Johnson Caves Boris Johnson pulled out of the race to lead the UK’s ruling Conservative Party and the nation, ending a bid to replace Liz Truss as prime minister.
